alert.note: Alert for Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 7:07PM CST until February 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 97.0 feet, Minor flooding begins around the lake, especially the north end of the lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 96.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday afternoon to a crest of 97.2 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 97.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Bundick Creek Bundick Lake 97.0 96.8 Sat 6 pm CST 96.8 97.1 97.2 &&
